meanings.definition: One of a million equal parts.
meanings.sent1: She only needed a millionths of the cake to satisfy her sweet tooth.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for adding a millionths of a teaspoon of salt for flavor.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he had a millionths of a chance of winning the lottery.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, our planet is just a tiny millionths of the whole.
meanings.sent5: The scientist explained that a millionths of a second can make a huge difference in an experiment.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to one millionth.
meanings.sent1: She was born on the millionths day of the year, January 1st.
meanings.sent2: The runner finished the race in the millionths position.
meanings.sent3: It felt like waiting for a millionths hour for the bus to arrive.
meanings.sent4: The millionths page of the book contained a surprising plot twist.
meanings.sent5: The millionths row in the stadium had the best view of the stage.
